list.title: UI - Portal V1
list.description: We will build a portal so that users can add, delete and update their accounts and suppliers for themselves.

list.title: API - Search Store
list.description: The first iteration of the product has a very limited store of data. We will build a store of search activity. Initially we need these data to analyse our own performance, the supplier performance and eventually the data will drive reports and dashboards in the portal.

list.title: API - Enhanced logging of prebook and book calls
list.description: We currently store a limited amount of information with respect to prebook and book calls.  This needs to be extended to allow us to provide better support, and eventually for customers to self-serve.

list.title: UI - Test Supplier
list.description: We have built a portal that enables us (and soon our customers) to configure their credentials for a new supplier.  However, the only way to test is to manually fire requests at the iVectorOne API and see if any search results come back. Instead, we would like to automate this capability by adding a “Test Supplier” button to the portal - where the suppliers are configured.
